answers.answer: Hi,I suggest that you consult a gynaecologist for an evaluation. Medical conditions like diabetes can affect fertility if not controlled well. Also semen problems in your husband can cause a delay in conception. Basic investigations like – basic scan, ovulation study, hormonal assay & semen analysis can be done. Hope this helps.The answer is based on information provided. Exact advice is not possible without a proper examination and investigations. You are requested to consult your Doctor. Take care and keep us posted.

question: My husband and I have been trying for four years to get pregnant. He is a type 1 diabetic, I have two kids already but he has none. What can I do to move it along
title: trying for four-year to get pregnant
